componentDescription: The foundation for building custom-styled select components.

propDescriptions.autoFocus: If true, the select element is focused during the first mount
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.components: The components used for each slot inside the Select. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each slot inside the Input.
propDescriptions.defaultListboxOpen: If true, the select will be initially open.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default selected value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.listboxId: id attribute of the listbox element. Also used to derive the id attributes of options.
propDescriptions.listboxOpen: Controls the open state of the select's listbox.
propDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when an option is selected.
propDescriptions.onListboxOpenChange: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened. Use in controlled mode (see listboxOpen).
propDescriptions.renderValue: Function that customizes the rendering of the selected value.
propDescriptions.value: The selected value. Set to null to deselect all options.
